4.text: Coil the rest of the rope behind your neck.

5.text: Take the coiled rope off your shoulders.

6.text: Wrap the folded rope just below your hand

7.text: Pull the loose ends partially through the fold with your hand, making a loop.

8.text: Hold the coiled rope by the loose ends and swing it to your back.

9.text: Bring the loose ends around to your back again

10.text: Bring the free ends forward once again
